emberknife.name: Emberknife
emberknife.description:
UNIQUE - Sear:Damaging Monsters burns them for (60 + 30% Ability Power + 5% bonus Attack Damage + 2% bonus Health) magic damage over 5 seconds.
UNIQUE - Challenging Path: Smiting 5 times consumes this item upgrade your Smite to Challenging Smite. Challenging Smite marks champions for 4 seconds. During this time, you deal 48 - 125 (based on level) bonus true damage to them over 2.5 seconds on hit and take 20% reduced damage from them.
UNIQUE - Huntsman: Killing large or epic monsters  grants +60 bonus experience. The first large monster killed grants +150 experience instead. If your gold from minions is greater than 40% your gold from monsters, a lane minion will grant 13 less gold and 50% reduced experience. This penalty is removed at 20 minutes.
UNIQUE - Recoup:Regenerates  up to 8 − 18 (based on level) mana per second when in the jungle or river, based on missing mana.

hailbalde.name: Hailblade
hailbalde.description:
UNIQUE - Sear:Damaging Monsters burns them for (60 + 30% Ability Power + 5% bonus Attack Damage + 2% bonus Health) magic damage over 5 seconds.
UNIQUE - Chilling Path: Smiting 5 times consumes this item upgrade your Smite to Chilling Smite. Chilling Smite deals 20 - 156 (based on level) true damage and steals 20% of their Move Speed for 2 seconds.
UNIQUE - Huntsman: Killing large or epic monsters  grants +60 bonus experience. The first large monster killed grants +150 experience instead. If your gold from minions is greater than 40% your gold from monsters, a lane minion will grant 13 less gold and 50% reduced experience. This penalty is removed at 20 minutes.
UNIQUE - Recoup:Regenerates  up to 8 − 18 (based on level) mana per second when in the jungle or river, based on missing mana.

recurve bow.name: Recurve Bow
recurve bow.description: UNIQUE - Steeltipped: Basic attacks deal 15 bonus physical damage on-hit.

doran's shield.name: Doran's Shield
doran's shield.description:
UNIQUE - Focus:Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
UNIQUE - Recovery:Restores 6 health every 5 seconds.
UNIQUE - Endure:After taking damage from a champion, large monster or epic monster, gain health regeneration equal to 0 - 40 (based on current missing health) health over 8 seconds. Reduced to 66% effectiveness on ranged champions or when triggered by AoE, DoT or proc effects.

doran's ring.name: Doran's Ring
doran's ring.description:
UNIQUE - Focus:Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
UNIQUE - Drain:Killing a minion restores 6 mana, if you can't gain mana, restore 3 health instead.

dark seal.name: Dark Seal
dark seal.description:
UNIQUE - Glory:Gain 2 stacks for each champion kill, 1 for assists, up to a maximum of 10. Lose 4 stacks on death.
UNIQUE - Dread:Gain 5 ability power for each stack of Glory.

cull.name: Cull
cull.description: UNIQUE - Reap:  Killing a minion grants +1 Gold +1, up to a maximum of +100 Gold +100. After having killed 100 minions, grants an additional +350 Gold +350 and permanently disables this passive.

health potion.name: Health Potion
health potion.description: Active - Consume: Drink the potion to restore 150 Health over 15 seconds.

total biscut of everlasting will.name: Total Biscuit of Everlasting Will
total biscut of everlasting will.description: Restores 10% of your missing health and 10% of your missing mana over 5 seconds. Manaless champions instead restore 12% of missing health.

kircheis shard.name: Kircheis Shard
kircheis shard.description:
UNIQUE - Energized: Moving and basic attacking generates Energize stacks, up to 100.
UNIQUE - Jolt:When fully Energized, your next basic attack deals 80 bonus magic damage on-hit.

refillable potion.name: Refillable Potion
refillable potion.description: Active - Consume: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health over 12 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

corrupting potion.name: Corrupting Potion
corrupting potion.description:
Active - Consume: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health and 75 Mana over 12 seconds. During this time, damaging Abilities and Attacks burn enemy champions for 15 (20 if you cannot gain Mana) magic damage over 3 seconds. Holds up to 3 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.
Corrupting damage is reduced to 50% when triggered by area of effect or periodic damage.

guardian's horn.name: Guardian's Horn
guardian's horn.description:
UNIQUE: Blocks 15 damage from all champion sources (3.75 damage vs. damage over time abilities).
UNIQUE - Legendary: This item counts as a Legendary item.

control ward.name: Control Ward
control ward.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.
You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

shurelyas battlesong.name: Shurelya's Battlesong
shurelyas battlesong.stats:
+20 Ability Haste
+350 Health
+5 Percent Movement Speed
+50 Percent Base Mana Regeneration
shurelyas battlesong.description: UNIQUE - Inspire: Grants you and nearby allies 40% bonus movement speed that decays over 4 seconds. Additionally, you and affected allied champions deal 35 - 55 (based on target's level) bonus magic damage on the next 3 attacks or ability hits against champions (90 second cooldown)

elixir of iron.name: Elixir of Iron
elixir of iron.description: Active - Consume: Drink to gain 300 Health, 25% Tenacity, and increased champion size for 3 minutes. While active, moving leaves a path behind that boosts allied champions' Move Speed by 15%.

elixir of sorcery.name: Elixir of Sorcery
elixir of sorcery.description: Active - Consume: Drink to gain 50 Ability Power and 15% Mana Regen for 3 minutes. While active, damaging a champion or turret deals 25 bonus true damage (5s cooldown).

elixir of wrath.name: Elixir of Wrath
elixir of wrath.description: Active - Consume: Drink to gain 30 Attack Damage and 15% Physical Vamp (against champions) for 3 minutes.

minion dematerializer.name: Minion Dematerializer
minion dematerializer.description:
Start the game with 3 Minion Dematerializers, which can be used to execute the target melee minion, caster minion, or siege minion.Dematerializers begin the game on a 180 second cooldown.
In addition to the kill gold and experience for the kill, you also gain 6 Percent increased damage to that type of minion for the remainder of the game. Dematerializers beyond the first used on the same type of minion increases this bonus by 3 Percent, up to a maximum of 12 Percent if all three are used on the same minion type.

commencing stopwatch.name: Commencing Stopwatch
commencing stopwatch.description:
Transforms into a Stopwatch after 14 minutes. Takedowns reduce this timer by 2 minutes. That Stopwatch contributes 250 gold to the items it builds into.
Stopwatch normally contributes 650 gold

stopwatch.name: Stopwatch
stopwatch.description: Active - Stasis: Use one time only to become Invulnerable and Untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time (transforms into a Broken Stopwatch).

broken stopwatch.name: Broken Stopwatch
broken stopwatch.description:
UNIQUE - Shatterd Time: Is borken, but can still be upgraded.
 After breaking one Stopwatch the shopkeeper will only sell you Broken Stopwatch.

slightly magical footwear.name: Slightly Magical Footwear
slightly magical footwear.description: UNIQUE - Slightly Quicker: +10 Bonus Movement Speed

perfectly timed stopwatch.name: Perfectly Timed Stopwatch
perfectly timed stopwatch.description: Active - Stasis: Use one time only to become Invulnerable and Untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time (transforms into a Broken Stopwatch).

abyssal mask.name: Abyssal Mask
abyssal mask.description: UNIQUE - Unamke: Immobilizing an enemy champion increases the damage they take by 10% for 4 seconds.

archangel's staff.name: Archangel's Staff
archangel's staff.description:
UNIQUE - Awe: Grants bonus ability power equal to 3% bonus mana.
UNIQUE - Mana Charge:  Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Affecting an enemy or ally with an ability consumes a charge and grants 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 if it's a champion, up to maximum of 360 bonus mana.
Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at +360 mana

manamune.name: Manamune
manamune.description:
UNIQUE - Awe: Grants bonus attack damage equal to 2% maximum mana.
UNIQUE - Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Consumes a charge on-hit and whenever affecting an enemy or ally with an ability to grant 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 for champion targets, up to maximum of 360 bonus mana.
Transforms into Muramana at +360 mana

berserker's greaves.name: Berserker's Greaves
berserker's greaves.description: Increases attack speed and movement speed

boots of swiftness.name: Boots of Swiftness
boots of swiftness.description: Enhances movement speed and reduces slow

chemtech putrifier.name: Chemtech Putrifier
chemtech putrifier.stats:
+50 ability power
+15 Ability Haste
+100 Percent Mana Regeneration
chemtech putrifier.description: UNIQUE - Puffcap Toxin: Dealing magic damage to enemy champions inflicts them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 2 seconds. Immobilizing enemy champions also inflicts them with 60% Grievous Wounds for 2 seconds.

sorcerer's shoes.name: Sorcerer's Shoes
sorcerer's shoes.description: Enhances movement speed and magic damage

guardian angel.name: Guardian Angel
guardian angel.description: UNIQUE - Rebirth: Upon taking lethal damage, resurrects and restores 50% of base health and 30% of maximum mana after 4 seconds of stasis (300 second cooldown).

infinity edge.name: Infinity Edge
infinity edge.stats:
+70 Attack Damage
+20 Percent Critical Strike Chance
infinity edge.description: UNIQUE - Perfection:  Gain 35% bonus critical strike damage if you have at least 60% critical strike chance.

mortal reminder.name: Mortal Reminder
mortal reminder.stats:
+20 Attack Damage
+25 Percent Attack Speed
+20 Percent Critical Strike Chance
+7 Percent Movement Speed
mortal reminder.description: UNIQUE - Sepsis: Dealing physical damage to enemy champions inflicts them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 2 seconds. Attacking a champion 3 times within 2 seconds increases this effect to 60% until it ends.

lord dominik's regards.name: Lord Dominik's Regards
lord dominik's regards.stats:
+25 Percent Armor Penetration
+35 Attack Damage
+20 Critical Strike Chance
lord dominik's regards.description: UNIQUE - Giant Slayer: Deal 0% − 15% (based on maximum health difference) bonus physical damage against enemy champions.

seraph's embrace.name: Seraph's Embrace
seraph's embrace.description:
UNIQUE - Awe:  Gain ability power equal to 5% bonus mana.
UNIQUE- Mana Empyrean: Increase your maximum mana by 5% (+ 2.5% per 100 AP).

mejai's soulstealer.name: Mejai's Soulstealer
mejai's soulstealer.description:
UNIQUE - Glory: Gain 4 stacks for each champion kill, 2 for assists, up to a maximum of 25. Lose 10 stacks on death. Stacks are preserved from Dark Seal.
UNIQUE - Deathwalker:  Gain 5 ability power for each stack of Glory and 10% bonus movement speed if you have at least 10 stacks.

muramana.name: Muramana
muramana.description:
UNIQUE - Awe:  Grants bonus attack damage equal to 2% maximum mana.
UNIQUE - Shock: Basic attacks on-hit and abilities that deal physical damage against champions deal 4% of maximum mana bonus physical damage. Can only be triggered on a single target and once every 4 seconds from the same attack or cast.

phage.name: Phage
phage.description: UNIQUE - Sturdy: After dealing physical damage to an enemy champion, Heal power.png heal for (Melee 2% / Ranged 1%) of maximum health over 6 seconds.

phantom dancer.name: Phantom Dancer
phantom dancer.stats:
+40 Attack Speed
+20 Percent Critical Strike Chance
+7 Percent Movement Speed
phantom dancer.description: UNIQUE - Spectral Waltz:  Basic attacks on-attack grant ghosting, 7% bonus movement speed, and a stack of Spectral Waltz for 3 seconds, up to 5 stacks. While at 5 stacks, gain 40% bonus attack speed.

plated steelcaps.name: Plated Steelcaps
plated steelcaps.description: Reduces incoming damage from all basic attacks by 12% (excluding turret shots).

zeke's convergence.name: Zeke's Convergence
zeke's convergence.description:
UNIQUE - Convergence:  For 8 seconds after you immobilize an enemy, your Accomplice's basic attacks (on-hit) and ability hits deal 30 − 70 (based on level) (+ 7.5% AP) (+ 1.5% maximum health) bonus magic damage to that enemy.
UNIQUE - Conduit: Designate an allied champion as the Accomplice, forming a tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as the Accomplice by one Zeke's Convergence at a time (60 second cooldown).

hearthbound axe.name: Hearthbound Axe
hearthbound axe.description: UNIQUE - Nimble:  Basic attacks grant (Melee 20 / Ranged 10) bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.

sterak's gage.name: Sterak's Gage
sterak's gage.description:
UNIQUE - Bloodlust: Dealing damage to or taking damage from a champion grants a stack, restoring (2% max Health | 1.2% max Health for Ranged champions) over 6 seconds.
UNIQUE - Lifeline: Upon taking damage that would reduce your Health below 30%, gain a 200 Shield (increased by (8% max Health | 4.8% max Health for Ranged champions) per stack of Bloodlust) for 5 seconds (60s cooldown).
Bloodlust stacks up to 5 times; 1 per champion. Healing and bonus shielding reduced to 60% for Ranged users.

sheen.name: Sheen
sheen.description: UNIQUE - Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional (100% base Attack Damage) physical damage (1.5s cooldown).

spirit visage.name: Spirit Visage
spirit visage.stats:
+10 Ability Haste
+450 Health
+100 Percent Base Health Regeneration
+40 Magic Resistance
spirit visage.description: UNIQUE - Boundless Vitality: Increases all Healing and Shielding effectiveness on you by 25%.

sunfire aegis.name: Sunfire Aegis
sunfire aegis.description:
UNIQUE - Immolate: Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing (20 - 40 (based on level) + 1% bonus Health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased by 25% against minions and 100% against monsters) for 3 seconds. Damaging Champions or Epic Monsters with this effect adds a stack, increasing subsequent Immolate damage by 12% for 5 seconds (max stacks 6).
UNIQUE - Flametouch: At maximum Immolate stacks, your Attacks burn nearby enemies for your Immolate damage per second for 3 seconds.

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

tear of the goddess.name: Tear of the Goddess
tear of the goddess.description:
UNIQUE - Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to Minions.
UNIQUE - Mana Charge: Strike a target with an Ability to consume a charge and gain 3 bonus Mana, up to a maximum of 360 bonus Mana. Bonus Mana doubled if the target is a champion.
Gain a new Mana Charge every 8 seconds (max 4).

black cleaver.name: Black Cleaver
black cleaver.description:
UNIQUE - Carve: Dealing physical damage to a champion applies a stack of 4% Armor reduction for 6 seconds (max 24% Armor reduction).
UNIQUE - Butcher: Basic attacks on-hit and damaging abilities against fully Shredded enemies deal bonus physical damage equal to 5% of their missing health, reduced to 2% of their missing health for damage over time effects (0.5 second cooldown).

bloodthirster.name: BloodThirster
bloodthirster.stats:
+55 Attack Damage
+20 Percent Critical Strike Chance
+20 Percent Lifesteal
bloodthirster.description: UNIQUE - Blood Barrier: Life Steal from Attacks can now overheal you. Excess Health is stored as a 50 - 350 (based on level) Shield that decays slowly if you haven't dealt or taken damage in the last 25 seconds.

ravenous hydra.name: Ravenous Hydra
ravenous hydra.stats:
+65 Attack Damage
+20 Ability Haste
+15 Percent Omnivamp
ravenous hydra.description:
UNIQUE - Cleave: Attacks and Abilities deal up to (60% Attack Damage) physical damage to other enemies near target hit.
Deals a minimum of (12% Attack Damage) damage to units at the end of its range, can only hit each target once per Attack or Ability, and doesn't trigger off of periodic damage.

thornmail.name: Thornmail
thornmail.description:
UNIQUE - Thorns: When struck by an Attack, deal (10 + 10% bonus Armor) magic damage to the attacker and apply 40% Grievous Wounds for 2 seconds if they are a champion. Immobilizing enemy champions also applies 60% Grievous Wounds for 2 seconds.
Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects.

bramble vest.name: Bramble Vest
bramble vest.stats:
UNIQUE - Thorns: When struck by an Attack, deal (3 + 10% bonus Armor) magic damage to the attacker and apply 40% Grievous Wounds for 2 seconds if they are a champion.
Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects.

tiamat.name: Tiamat
tiamat.description:
UNIQUE - Cleave: Attacks deal up to (60% Attack Damage) physical damage to other nearby enemies.
Minimum of (12% Attack Damage) damage to enemies furthest away.

trinity force.name: Trinity Force
trinity force.stats:
+10 Ability Haste
+35 Attack Damage
+35 Percent Attack Speed
+200 Health
trinity force.description:
UNIQUE - Threefold Strike: Attacks grant 25 Move Speed for 3 seconds. If the target is a champion, increase your base Attack Damage by 6% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 5 times (Max increase 30% AD).
UNIQUE - Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional (200% base Attack Damage) physical damage (1.5s cooldown).

MYTHIC PASSIVE: Grants all other Legendary items 10 Attack Speed.

warden's mail.name: Warden's Mail
warden's mail.description: UNIQUE - Rock Solid: Reduce incoming damage from Attacks by up to (0.5% max Health), capped at 40% of the attack's damage.

warmog's armor.name: Warmog's Armor
warmog's armor.stats:
+800 Health
+10 Ability Haste
+200 Percent Base Health Regeneration
warmog's armor.description: UNIQUE - Warmog's Heart:  If you have at least 3000 maximum Health, restore 5% max Health per second if damage hasn't been taken within 6 seconds (3 seconds for non-Champions).

runaan's hurricane.name: Runaan's Hurricane
runaan's hurricane.stats:
+25 Attack Damage
+40 Percent Attack Speed
+20 Percent Critical Strike Chance
+7 Percent Movement Speed
runaan's hurricane.description:
UNIQUE - Wind's Fury: When Attacking, bolts are fired at up to 2 enemies near the target, each dealing (40-70% () Attack Damage) physical damage. Bolts apply On-Hit effects and can Critically Strike.
Item is for Ranged champions only.

zeal.name: Zeal
zeal.stats:
+18 Percent Attack Speed
+15 Percent Critical Strike Chance

rabadon's deathcap.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
rabadon's deathcap.description: UNIQUE - Magical Opus: Increases your total Ability Power by 35%.

wit's end.name: Wit's End
wit's end.stats:
+30 Attack Damage
+40 Percent Attack Speed
+50 Magic Resistance
wit's end.description: UNIQUE - Fray: Attacks apply 15 - 80 (based on level) magic damage On-Hit and grant 20 Move Speed for 2 seconds.

rapid firecannon.name: Rapid Firecannon
rapid firecannon.stats:
+35 Percent Attack Speed
+20 Percent Critical Strike Chance
+7 Percent Movement Speed
rapid firecannon.description:
UNIQUE - Energized: Moving and Attacking will generate an Energized Attack.
UNIQUE - Sharpshooter: Your Energized Attack applies 120 bonus magic damage. In addition, Energized attacks gain up to 35% bonus Attack Range.
Attack Range cannot increase more than 150 units.

stormrazor.name: Stormrazor
stormrazor.stats:
+40 Attack Damage
+15 Attack Speed
+20 Percent Critical Strike Chance
stormrazor.description:
UNIQUE - Energized: Moving and Attacking will generate an Energized Attack.
UNIQUE - Paralyze: Your Energized Attack gains 120 bonus magic damage. In addition, Energized Attacks slow enemies by 75% for 0.5 seconds.

lich bane.name: Lich Bane
lich bane.description: UNIQUE - Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional (150% base Attack Damage + 40% Ability Power) magic damage (2.5s cooldown).

banshee's veil.name: Banshee's Veil
banshee's veil.stats:
+65 Ability Power
+10 Ability Haste
+45 Magic Resistance
banshee's veil.description: UNIQUE - Annul: Grants a Spell Shield that blocks the next enemy Ability (40s cooldown).

redemption.name: Redemption
redemption.stats:
+20 Percent Heal and Shield Power
+200 Health
+15 Ability Haste
+100 Percent Base Mana Regeneration
redemption.description:
UNIQUE - Intervention: Target an area within 5500 range. After 2.5 seconds, call down a beam of light to Restore 180 - 360 (scales with ally level) Health to allies and burn enemy champions for 10% max Health true damage (120s cooldown).
Item can be activated whilst dead. Damage and healing reduced by 50% if the target has recently been affected by another Intervention. Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

fiendish codex.name: Fiendish Codex
fiendish codex.description: Increases Ability Power and Cooldown Reduction

knight's vow.name: Knight's Vow
knight's vow.stats:
+400 Health
+10 Ability Haste
+300 Percent Base Health Regeneration
knight's vow.description:
UNIQUE - Sacrifice: While your Worthy ally is nearby, redirect 15% of damage they take to you and if they have less than 50% Health gain 35% Move Speed when running towards them.
UNIQUE - Pledge: Designate an ally who is Worthy (60s cooldown).
Champions can only be linked by one Knight's Vow at a time. Damage redirection stops if you have less than 30% Health

frozen heart.name: Frozen Heart
frozen heart.description:
UNIQUE - Rock Solid: Reduce incoming damage from Attacks by up to (0.5% max Health), capped at 40% of the Attack's damage.
UNIQUE - Winter's Caress: Reduces the Attack Speed of nearby enemies by 15%.

mercury's treads.name: Mercury's Treads
mercury's treads.stats:
+25 Magic Resist
+45 Movement Speed
+30 Percent Tenacity
mercury's treads.description: Tenacity reduces the duration of Stun, Slow, Taunt, Fear, Silence, Blind, Polymorph and Immobilizing effects. It has no effect on Airborne or Suppression.

guardian's orb.name: Guardian's Orb
guardian's orb.description:
Recovery: Restores 10 Mana every 5 seconds. If you can't gain mana, restores 15 Health instead.
UNIQUE - Legendary: This item counts as a Legendary item.

aether wisp.name: Aether Wisp
aether wisp.description: UNIQUE - Glide: Gain 5 Percent Movement Speed

forbidden idol.name: Forbidden Idol
forbidden idol.stats:
+10 Percent Heal and Shield Power
+50 Percent Base Mana Regeneration
forbidden idol.description: Increases Heal and Shield Power and Mana Regeneration

nashor's tooth.name: Nashor's Tooth
nashor's tooth.description: UNIQUE - Icathian Bite: Attacks apply (15 + 20% Ability Power) magic damage On-Hit.

rylai's crystal scepter.name: Rylai's Crystal Scepter
rylai's crystal scepter.description: UNIQUE - Rimefrost:  Damaging Abilities Slow enemies by 30% for 1 second.

mobility boots.name: Mobility Boots
mobility boots.description: When out of combat for at least 5 seconds, increase this item's effect to 115.

executioner's calling.name: Executioner's Calling
executioner's calling.description:
UNIQUE - Rend: Dealing physical damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to champions for 2 seconds.
Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects.

guinsoo's rageblade.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
guinsoo's rageblade.stats:
+40 Percent Attack Speed
+20 Percent Critical Strike Chance
guinsoo's rageblade.description:
UNIQUE - Wrath:Your Critical Strike Chance is converted into On-Hit damage. Gain 40 On-Hit for each 20% Critical Strike Chance converted.
UNIQUE - Seething Strike: Every third Attack applies your On-Hit effects twice.

mercurial scimitar.name: Mercurial Scimitar
mercurial scimitar.stats:
+40 Attack Damage
+20 Percent Critical Strike Chance
+30 Magic Resist
mercurial scimitar.description: UNIQUE - Quicksilver: Remove all crowd control debuffs (excluding Airborne) and also gain 50% Move Speed for 1 second (90s cooldown).

quicksilver sash.name: Quicksilver Sash
quicksilver sash.description: UNIQUE - Quicksilver: Removes all crowd control debuffs (excluding Airborne) (90s cooldown).

youmuu's ghostblade.name: Youmuu's Ghostblade
youmuu's ghostblade.description:
UNIQUE - Wraith Step: Gain 20% Move Speed and Ghosting for 6 seconds (45s cooldown).UNIQUE - Haunt: Gain 40 Move Speed out of combat.
Ghosted units ignore collision with other units.

randuin's omen.name: Randuin's Omen
randuin's omen.description:
UNIQUE - Rock Solid: Reduce incoming damage from Attacks by up to (0.5% max Health), capped at 40% of the attack's damage.
UNIQUE - Humility:  Briefly Slow nearby enemies and reduce their Attack Damage by 10% and Critical Strike Damage by 20% for 4 seconds (60s cooldown).

hextech alternator.name: Hextech Alternator
hextech alternator.description: UNIQUE - Revved: Damaging a champion deals an additional 50 - 125 (based on level) magic damage (40s cooldown).

hextech rocketbelt.name: Hextech Rocketbelt
hextech rocketbelt.description:
UNIQUE - Hex Bolt: Dash in target direction, unleashing an arc of magic missiles that deal (175 - 250 (based on level) +15% Ability Power) magic damage. Then, gain 50% Move Speed towards enemy champions for 2 seconds (40s cooldown)

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Magic Penetration.

blade of the runied king.name: Blade of The Ruined King
blade of the runied king.stats:
+40 Attack Damage
+25 Percent Attack Speed
+12 Percent Life Steal
blade of the runied king.description:
UNIQUE - Mist's Edge: Attacks apply physical damage On-Hit equal to (10% for Melee users | 6% for Ranged users) of the target's current Health.
UNIQUE - Siphon: Attacking a champion 3 times deals 40 - 150 (based on level) magic damage and steals 25% Move Speed for 2 seconds (20s cooldown).
Maximum Mist's Edge damage dealt to monsters and minions is 60.

hexdrinker.name: Hexdrinker
hexdrinker.description: UNIQUE - Lifeline:Upon taking magic damage that would reduce Health below 30%, gain 110 - 280 (based on level) magic damage Shield for 3 seconds (90s cooldown).

maw of malmortius.name: Maw of Malmortius
maw of malmortius.stats:
+50 Attack Damage
+50 Magic Resist
+15 Ability Haste
maw of malmortius.description: UNIQUE - Lifeline: Upon taking magic damage that would reduce Health below 30%, gain (200 + 20% max Health) magic damage Shield for 5 seconds (60s cooldown).

zhonya's hourglass.name: Zhonya's Hourglass
zhonya's hourglass.description: UNIQUE - Statis: You become Invulnerable and Untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time (120s cooldown).

morellonomicon.name: Morellonomicon
morellonomicon.description: UNIQUE - Affliction: Dealing magic damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to enemy champions for 2 seconds. If the target is below 50% Health, this effect is increased to 60% Grievous Wounds.

guardian's blade.name: Guardian's Blade
guardian's blade.description: UNIQUE - Legendary: This item counts as a Legendary item.

umbral glaive.name: Umbral Glaive
umbral glaive.description: UNIQUE - Blackout:  When spotted by an enemy Ward, reveal traps and disable Wards around you for 8 seconds (45s cooldown). Your Attacks instantly kill revealed traps and do triple damage to Wards.

sanguine blade.name: Sanguine Blade
sanguine blade.description: UNIQUE - Frenzy:  While near one or fewer visible enemy champions gain 8 Lethality and 20% - 80% Attack Speed, decaying over 3 seconds if other enemy champions get too close.

guardian's hammer.name: Guardian's Hammer
guardian's hammer.description: UNIQUE - Legendary: This item counts as a Legendary item.

locket of the iron solari.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
locket of the iron solari.stats:
+20 Ability Haste
+30 Armor
+200 Health
+30 Magic Resistance
locket of the iron solari.description:
UNIQUE - Devotion: Grant nearby allies a 230 - 385 (based on ally level) Shield, decaying over 2.5 seconds (90s cooldown).
UNIQUE - Consecrate: Grant nearby allied champions 5 Armor and Magic Resist.

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 2 Armor/ Magic Resist increase to Consecrate.

seeker's armguard.name: Seeker's Armguard
seeker's armguard.description: UNIQUE - Witch's Path: Killing a unit grants 1 Armor (max 30).

gargoyle stoneplate.name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
gargoyle stoneplate.description:
UNIQUE - Unbreakable: Gain a (100 + 100% bonus Health) Shield that decays and grow 25% in size for 2.5 seconds. (90s cooldown).
UNIQUE - Fortify: Taking damage from a champion grants a stack of 3% bonus Armor and 3% bonus Magic Resist for 6 seconds.
Max 5 stacks; 1 per champion.

spectre's cowl.name: Spectre's Cowl
spectre's cowl.description: UNIQUE - Incorporeal: After taking damage from a champion, gain 150% base Health Regen for up to 10 seconds (duration increases with damage taken).

mikael's blessing.name: Mikael's Blessing
mikael's blessing.stats:
+20 Percent Heal and Shield Power
+50 Magic Resist
+15 Ability Haste
+100 Percent Base Mana Regeneration
mikael's blessing.description: UNIQUE - Purify: Remove all crowd control debuffs (except Knockups and Suppression) from an ally champion and restore 100 - 200 (based on ally level) Health (120s cooldown).

scarecrow effigy.name: Scarecrow Effigy
scarecrow effigy.description:
Active - Trinket: Places an effigy that lasts for 130 - 300 (based on level) seconds and appears exactly as Fiddlesticks does to enemies. Stores one charge every 115 - 30 (based on level) seconds, up to maximum 2 charges.
Enemy champions approaching an effigy will activate it, causing the effigy to fake a random action, after which the effigy will fall apart.

stealth ward.name: Stealth Ward
stealth ward.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120

farsight alteration.name: Farsight Alteration
farsight alteration.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilties (198 - 99s cooldown).

oracle lens.name: Oracle Lens
oracle lens.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

your cut.name: Your Cut
your cut.description: Consume - Gain 100-300 (based on kill bounty) increased by 100 gold for First Blood
your cut.cost: Only by Pyke's Death from Below

ardent censer.name: Ardent Censer
ardent censer.stats:
+60 Ability Power
+10 Percent Heal and Shield Power
+100 Percent Base Mana Regeneration
ardent censer.description: UNIQUE - Sanctify: Healing or Shielding an ally enhances you both for 6 seconds, granting your Attacks 10% - 30% (based on ally level) Attack Speed and 5 - 20 (based on ally level) magic damage On-Hit.

essence reaver.name: Essence Reaver
essence reaver.stats:
+55 Attack Damage
+20 Percent Critical Strike Chance
+20 Ability Haste
essence reaver.description: UNIQUE - Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional (100% base Attack Damage + 40% bonus Attack Damage) physical damage and restores 3% max Mana (1.5s cooldown).

eye of the herald.name: Eye of the Herald
eye of the herald.description: PASSIVE - GLIMPSE OF THE VOID: The holder of this buff has Empowered Recall. This passive is lost when the Eye is crushed or the duration ends.CONSUME - HERALD'S CALL: Crushing the Eye of the Herald instigates a 1 second channel to summon an allied Rift Herald Rift Herald that sieges enemy structures. This channel cannot be interrupted by any means. Herald's Call goes on a 3-second cooldown if the holder of the Eye is in combat with minions.

kalista's black spear.name: Kalista's Black Spear
kalista's black spear.description: Active - Consume: Bind with an ally for the remainder of the game, becoming Oathsworn Allies. Oathsworn empowers you both while near one another.

dead man's plate.name: Dead Man's Plate
dead man's plate.description: UNIQUE - Shipwrecker: While moving, build up to 60 bonus Move Speed. Your next Attack discharges built up Move Speed to deal up to 100 magic damage. If dealt by a Melee champion at top speed, the Attack also Slows the target by 50% for 1 second.

titanic hydra.name: Titanic Hydra
titanic hydra.description:
UNIQUE - Colossus: Gain bonus Attack Damage equal to 1% max Health.
UNIQUE - Cleave: Attacks apply an additional (5 + 1.5% max Health) physical damage On-Hit, creating a shockwave that deals (40 + 3% max Health) physical damage to enemies behind the target.
Deals 75% for Ranged users. On-Hit damage is also applied to Structures.

lost chapter.name: Lost Chapter
lost chapter.description: UNIQUE - Enlighten: Upon levelling up, restores 20% max Mana over 3 seconds.

edge of night.name: Edge of Night
edge of night.description: UNIQUE - Annul: Gain a Spell Shield that blocks the next enemy Ability (40s cooldown).

spellthief's edge.name: Spellthief's Edge
spellthief's edge.stats:
+8 Ability Power
+10 Health
+50 Percent Base Mana Regeneration
+2 Gold per 10 Seconds
spellthief's edge.description:
UNIQUE - Tribute: While nearby an ally champion, damaging Abilities and Attacks against champions or buildings grant 20 gold. This can occur up to 3 times every 30 seconds.
UNIQUE - Quest: Earn 500 gold from this item to transform it into Frostfang, gaining Active - Warding.
This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

frostfang.name: Frostfang
frostfang.stats:
+15 Ability Power
+70 Health
+75 Percent Base Mana Regeneration
+3 Gold per 10 Seconds
frostfang.description:
UNIQUE - Active - Ward: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 3 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.
UNIQUE - Tribute: While nearby an ally champion, damaging Abilities and Attacks against champions or buildings grant 20 gold. This can occur up to 3 times every 30 seconds.
UNIQUE - Quest: Earn 1000 gold from this item to transform it into Shard of True Ice.
This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

shard of true ice.name: Shard of True Ice
shard of true ice.stats:
+40 Ability Power
+3 Gold per 10 Seconds
+75 Health
+100 Percent Base Mana Regeneration
shard of true ice.description:
UNIQUE - Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 4 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.
This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

steel shoulderguards.name: Steel Shoulderguards
steel shoulderguards.stats:
+3 Attack Damage
+30 Health
+25 Percent Base Health Regeneration
+2 Gold per 10 Seconds
steel shoulderguards.description:
UNIQUE - Spoils of War: While nearby an allied champion, Attacks execute minions below (50% for Melee Users | 30% for Ranged Users) of their max Health. Killing a minion grants the same kill gold to the nearest allied champion. These effects recharge every 35 seconds (Max 3 charges).
UNIQUE - Quest: Earn 500 gold from this item to transform it into Runesteel Spaulders, gaining Active - Warding.
This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

runesteel spaulders.name: Runesteel Spaulders
runesteel spaulders.stats:
+6 Attack Damage
+100 Health
+50 Percent Base Health Regeneration
+3 Gold per 10 Seconds
runesteel spaulders.description:
UNIQUE - Active - Ward: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 3 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.
UNIQUE - Spoils of War: While nearby an allied champion, Attacks execute minions below 0% of their max Health. Killing a minion grants the same kill gold to the nearest allied champion. These effects recharge every 0 seconds (Max 0 charges).
UNIQUE - Quest: Earn 1000 gold from this item to transform it into Pauldrons of Whiterock.
This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

pauldrons of whiterock.name: Pauldrons of Whiterock
pauldrons of whiterock.stats:
+15 Attack Damage
+250 Health
+100 Percent Base Health Regeneration
+3 Gold per 10 Seconds
pauldrons of whiterock.description:
UNIQUE - Active - Ward: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 4 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.
This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

relic shield.name: Relic Shield
relic shield.stats:
+5 Ability Power
+30 Health
+25 Percent Base Health Regeneration
+2 Gold per 10 Seconds
relic shield.description:
UNIQUE - Spoils of War: While nearby an allied champion, Attacks execute minions below (50% for Melee Users | 30% for Ranged Users) of their max Health. Killing a minion grants the same kill gold to the nearest allied champion. These effects recharge every 35 seconds (Max 3 charges).
UNIQUE - Quest: Earn 500 gold from this item to transform it into Targon's Buckler, gaining Active - Warding.
This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

targon's buckler.name: Targon's Buckler
targon's buckler.stats:
+10 Ability Power
+100 Health
+50 Percent Base Health Regeneration
+3 Gold per 10 Seconds
targon's buckler.description:
UNIQUE - Active - Ward: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 3 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.
UNIQUE- Spoils of War: While nearby an allied champion, Attacks execute minions below 0% of their max Health. Killing a minion grants the same kill gold to the nearest allied champion. These effects recharge every 0 seconds (Max 0 charges).
UNIQUE - Quest: Earn 1000 gold from this item to transform it into Bulwark of the Mountain.
This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

bulwark of the mountain.name: Bulwark of the Mountain
bulwark of the mountain.stats:
+20 Ability Power
+250 Health
+100 Percent Base Health Regeneration
+3 Gold per 10 Seconds
bulwark of the mountain.description:
UNIQUE - Active - Ward: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 4 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.
This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

spectral sickle.name: Spectral Sickle
spectral sickle.stats:
+5 Attack Damage
+10 Health
+25 Percent Mana Regeneration
+2 Gold per 10 Seconds
spectral sickle.description:
UNIQUE - Tribute: While nearby an ally champion, damaging Abilities and Attacks against champions or buildings grant 20 gold. This can occur up to 3 times every 30 seconds.
UNIQUE - Quest: Earn 500 gold from this item to transform it into Harrowing Crescent, gaining Active - Warding.
This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

harrowing crescent.name: Harrowing Crescent
harrowing crescent.stats:
+10 Attack Damage
+60 Health
+50 Percent Mana Regeneration
+3 Gold per 10 Seconds
harrowing crescent.description:
UNIQUE - Active - Ward: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 3 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.
UNIQUE - Tribute: While nearby an ally champion, damaging Abilities and Attacks against champions or buildings grant 20 gold. This can occur up to 3 times every 30 seconds.
UNIQUE - Quest: Earn 1000 gold from this item to transform it into Black Mist Scythe.
This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

black mist scythe.name: Black Mist Scythe
black mist scythe.stats:
+20 Attack Damage
+75 Health
+100 Percent Base Mana Regeneration
+3 Gold per 10 Seconds
black mist scythe.description:
UNIQUE- Active - Ward: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 4 Stealth Wards, which refill upon visiting the shop.
This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

oblivion orb.name: Oblivion Orb
oblivion orb.description:
UNIQUE - Cursed: Dealing magic damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to champions for 2 seconds.
Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects.

imperial mandate.name: Imperial Mandate
imperial mandate.stats:
+40 Ability Power
+200 Health
+20 Ability Haste
+100 Base Mana Regeneration
imperial mandate.description:
UNIQUE - Coordinated Fire: Abilities that Slow or Immobilize a champion deal 90 - 150 (based on level) bonus magic damage and marks them for 4 seconds. Ally champion damage detonates the mark, dealing an additional 90 - 150 (based on ally level) magic damage and granting you both 20% Move Speed for 2 seconds. (6s cooldown per champion).

UNIQUE - Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 15 Ability Power.

force of nature.name: Force of Nature
force of nature.stats:
+350 Health
+60 Magic Resist
+5 Percent Movement Speed
force of nature.description: UNIQUE - Absorb: Taking damage from Abilities grants you 6 Move Speed and 4 Magic Resist for 5 seconds (stacks up to 5 times; each unique Ability instance can give one stack).

the golden spatula.name: The Golden Spatula
the golden spatula.stats:
+70 Attack Damage
+120 Ability Power
+50 Percent Attack Speed
+30 Percent Critical Strike Chance
+250 Health
+30 Armor
+30 Magic Resist
+250 Mana
+20 Ability Haste
+10 Percent Movement Speed
+10 Percent Life Steal
+100 Percent Base Health Regeneration
+100 Percent Base Mana Regeneration
the golden spatula.description: Doing Something: You are permanently On Fire!

horizon focus.name: Horizon Focus
horizon focus.description:
UNIQUE - Hypershot: Damaging a champion with a non-targeted Ability at over 750 range or Immobilizing them Reveals them and increases their damage taken from you by 10% for 6 seconds.
The Ability that triggers Hypershot also benefits from the damage increase. Pets and non-immobilizing traps do not trigger this effect. Only the initial placement of zone Abilities will trigger this effect. Distance is measured from the Ability cast position.

cosmic drive.name: Cosmic Drive
cosmic drive.description: UNIQUE - Spelldance: Dealing damage with Abilities grants (10 + 20% Ability Haste) Move Speed for 4 seconds.

verdant barrier.name: Verdant Barrier
verdant barrier.description:
UNIQUE - Adaptive: Every 60 seconds, gain 3 Magic Resist (max 15). Taking magic damage from champions reduces the time until the next increase.
Time reduction (in seconds) is equal to 5% of the damage amount.

riftmaker.name: Riftmaker
riftmaker.stats:
+80 Ability Power
+150 Health
+15 Ability Haste
+15 Omnivamp
riftmaker.description:
UNIQUE - Void Corruption: For each second damaging enemy champions, deal 2% bonus damage (max 10%). At maximum strength, the bonus damage is dealt as true damage instead.

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5% Magic Penetration.

night harvester.name: Night Harvester
night harvester.description:
UNIQUE - Soulrend: Damaging a champion deals an additional 125 - 200 (scaling with Level) (+15% AP) magic damage and grants you 25% Move Speed for 1.5 seconds (40s cooldown per champion).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.
Damaging a new champion will extend the duration of the Move Speed bonus.

demonic embrace.name: Demonic Embrace
demonic embrace.description: UNIQUE - Azakana Gaze: Dealing Ability damage burns enemies for 1.2% max Health magic damage every second for 4 seconds. You gain 10 Armor and Magic Resist if a champion is affected (+2.5 Armor and Magic Resist for each additional champion affected).

watchful wardstone.name: Watchful Wardstone
watchful wardstone.description:
UNIQUE - Arcane Cache: This item can store up to 3 purchased Control Wards.
UNIQUE - Behold: Increase your Stealth Ward and Control Ward placement caps by 1.
Stealth Wards are placed from the Stealth Ward Trinket and the upgraded Unique: Support items.

stirring wardstone.name: Stirring Wardstone
stirring wardstone.description:
UNIQUE - Arcane Cache: This item can store up to 3 purchased Control Wards.
UNIQUE - Blooming Empire: This item transforms into Watchful Wardstone once 20 Stealth Wards have been placed.
Stealth Wards are placed from the Stealth Ward Trinket and the upgraded Unique: Support items.

bandleglass mirror.name: Bandleglass Mirror
bandleglass mirror.stats:
+20 Ability Power
+10 Ability Haste
+50 Percent Base Mana Regeneration
bandleglass mirror.description: Increases magic damage, cooldown reduction and mana regeneration

vigilant wardstone.name: Vigilant Wardstone
vigilant wardstone.description:
UNIQUE - Arcane Cache: This item can store up to 3 purchased Control Wards.
UNIQUE - Behold: Increase your Stealth Ward and Control Ward placement caps by 1.

ironspike whip.name: Ironspike Whip
ironspike whip.description: UNIQUE - Active - Crescent: Deal (75% Attack Damage) physical damage to nearby enemies. Minions and monsters below 40% Health take 200% damage (15s cooldown, affected by Ability Haste).

silvermere dawn.name: Silvermere Dawn
silvermere dawn.description: UNIQUE - Active - Quicksilver: Remove all crowd control debuffs (excluding Airborne) and gain 40% Tenacity and 40% Slow Resistance for 3 seconds (90s cooldown).

death's dance.name: Death's Dance
death's dance.description:
UNIQUE - Ignore Pain: 35% (15% for Ranged users) of physical damage taken is dealt to you over 3 seconds instead.
UNIQUE - Defy: Champion takedowns cleanse Ignore Pain's remaining damage pool, grant you 30% Move Speed for 2 seconds and restore 10% of max Health over the duration.

chempunk chainsword.name: Chempunk Chainsword
chempunk chainsword.description:
UNIQUE - Hackshorn: Dealing physical damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to enemy champions for 2 seconds. If the target is below 50% Health, this effect is increased to 60% Grievous Wounds.
Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects.

staff of flowing water.name: Staff of Flowing Water
staff of flowing water.stats:
+60 Ability Power
+10 Percent Heal and Shield Power
+100 Percent Base Mana Regeneration
staff of flowing water.description:
UNIQUE - Rapids: Healing or Shielding an ally grants you both 15% Move Speed and 20 - 40 (ally ) Ability Power for 3 seconds.
Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

moonstone renewer.name: Moonstone Renewer
moonstone renewer.stats:
+40 Ability Power
+200 Health
+20 Ability Haste
+100 Percent Base Mana Regeneration
moonstone renewer.description:
UNIQUE - Starlit Grace: When affecting champions with Attacks or Abilities in combat, restore 60 - 90 (based on ally level) Health to the most wounded nearby ally (2s cooldown). Each second spent in combat with champions increases this healing effect by 12.5% (to a maximum of 50%).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

goredrinker.name: Goredrinker
goredrinker.stats:
+45 Attack Damage
+400 Health
+20 Ability Haste
+150 Percent Base Health Regeneration
goredrinker.description:
UNIQUE - Active - Thirsting Slash: Deal (110% Attack Damage) physical damage to nearby enemies. Restore (20% Attack Damage + 12% missing Health) for each champion hit (15s cooldown, reduced by Ability Haste).
UNIQUE - Spite: Gain 1% Attack Damage for each 5% missing Health (max 15%).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

stridebreaker.name: Stridebreaker
stridebreaker.stats:
+50 Attack Damage
+20 Percent Attack Speed
+300 Health
+10 Ability Haste
stridebreaker.description:
UNIQUE - Active - Halting Slash: Lunge a short distance and deal (110% Attack Damage) physical damage to nearby enemies, Slowing them by 60%, decaying over 2 seconds (20s cooldown, affected by Ability Haste).
UNIQUE - Heroic Gait: Dealing physical damage grants 30 Move Speed for 2 seconds.

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 3% Move Speed.
Halting Slash's dash cannot pass through terrain.

divine sunderer.name: Divine Sunderer
divine sunderer.description:
UNIQUE - Spellblade: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional 10% target max Health physical damage (1.5s cooldown). If the target is a champion, restore 50% of the enhanced damage (30% for Ranged owners).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5% Armor Penetration

liandry's anguish.name: Liandry's Anguish
liandry's anguish.description:
UNIQUE - Torment: Dealing damage with Abilities causes enemies to burn for (15 + 1.5% Ability Power) + 1% max Health magic damage per second for 4 seconds. Whilst burning, they lose 5% Magic Resist per second (max reduction 15%).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

luden's tempest.name: Luden's Tempest
luden's tempest.stats:
+80 Ability Power
+6 Magic Penetration
+600 Mana
+20 Ability Haste
luden's tempest.description:
UNIQUE - Echo: Damaging Abilities deal an additional (100 + 10% Ability Power) magic damage to the target and 3 nearby enemies and grants you 15% Move Speed for 2 seconds (10s cooldown).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Magic Penetration.

everfrost.name: Everfrost
everfrost.stats:
+80 Ability Power
+200 Health
+600 Mana
+20 Ability Haste
everfrost.description:
UNIQUE - Active - Glaciate: Deal (100 + 30% Ability Power) magic damage in a cone, Slowing enemies by 65% for 1.5 seconds. Enemies at the center of the cone are Rooted instead (20s cooldown).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 15 Ability Power.

bami's cinder.name: Bami's Cinder
bami's cinder.description: UNIQUE - Immolate : Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing (15 + 1% bonus Health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased by 25% against minions and 25% against monsters) for 3 seconds.

frostfire gauntlet.name: Frostfire Gauntlet
frostfire gauntlet.stats:
+350 Health
+50 Armor
+25 Magic Resist
+15 Ability Haste
frostfire gauntlet.description:
UNIQUE - Immolate : Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing (20 - 40 (based on level) + 1% bonus Health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters) for 3 seconds.
UNIQUE - Snowbind: Attacks create a frost field for 1.5 seconds (4s cooldown). Enemies that move across the field are Slowed by 25% (increased by your max Health).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 100 Health and 6% Size.

turbo chemtank.name: Turbo Chemtank
turbo chemtank.stats:
+350 Health
+25 Armor
+50 Magic Resist
+15 Ability Haste
turbo chemtank.description:
UNIQUE - Active - Supercharged: Grants 75% Move Speed towards enemies or enemy turrets for 4 seconds. Once near an enemy (or after 4 seconds) a shockwave is emitted that Slows nearby champions by 40% for 1.5 seconds (90s cooldown).
UNIQUE - Immolate: Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing (20 - 40 (based on level) + 1% bonus Health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters) for 3 seconds.
Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5% Tenacity and Slow Resist.

noonquiver.name: Noonquiver
noonquiver.description: UNIQUE - Precision: Attacks deal an additional 20 physical damage to Minions and Monsters.

galeforce.name: Galeforce
galeforce.stats:
+60 Attack Damage
+20 Percent Attack Speed
+20 Percent Critical Strike Chance
galeforce.description:
UNIQUE - Active - Cloudburst: Dash in target direction, firing three missiles at the lowest Health enemy near your destination (prioritizing champions). Deals a total of (180 - 220 (based on level) + 45% bonus Attack Damage) magic damage, increased against low Health targets by up to 50% (60s cooldown).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 3% Move Speed.

Maximum missile damage dealt when enemy Health is below 30%.
Cloudburst's dash cannot pass through terrain.

kraken slayer.name: Kraken Slayer
kraken slayer.stats:
+65 Attack Damage
+25 Percent Attack Speed
+20 Percent Critical Strike Chance
kraken slayer.description:
UNIQUE - Bring It Down: Every third Attack deals an additional (60 + 45% bonus Attack Damage) true damage.

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 10% Attack Speed.

immortal shieldbow.name: Immortal Shieldbow
immortal shieldbow.stats:
+50 Attack Damage
+15 Percent Attack Speed
+20 Percent Critical Strike Chance
+12 Percent Lifesteal
immortal shieldbow.description:
UNIQUE - Lifeline: When taking damage that would reduce you below 30% Health, gain a 250 - 700 Shield for 3s. In addition, gain 15% Life Steal for 8s (90s cooldown).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Attack Damage and 50 Health.

navori quickblades.name: Navori Quickblades
navori quickblades.stats:
+60 Attack Damage
+20 Percent Critical Strike Chance
+30 Ability Haste
navori quickblades.description: UNIQUE - Deft Strikes: Your critical strikes with Attacks reduce your non-Ultimate Ability cooldowns by 20% of their remaining cooldown.

the collector.name: The Collector
the collector.stats:
+55 Attack Damage
+20 Percent Critical Strike Chance
+12 Lethality
the collector.description: UNIQUE - Death and Taxes: Dealing damage that would leave an enemy champion below 5% Health executes them. Champion kills grant an additional 25 gold.

rageknife.name: Rageknife
rageknife.description: UNIQUE - Wrath: Your Critical Strike Chance is converted into On-Hit damage. Gain 35 On-Hit for each 20% Critical Strike Chance converted.

duskblade of draktharr.name: Duskblade of Draktharr
duskblade of draktharr.description: UNIQUE - Nightstalker: Attacking a champion deals an additional (100 + 30% bonus Attack Damage) physical damage (15s cooldown). If dealt by a Melee champion, this Attack also Slows the target by 99% for 0.25 seconds. When a champion that you have damaged within the last 3 seconds dies, this cooldown is refreshed and you become Invisible for 1.5 seconds.

eclipse.name: Eclipse
eclipse.description:
UNIQUE - Ever Rising Moon: Hitting a champion with 2 separate Attacks or Abilities within 1.5 seconds deals an additional 6% max Health physical damage, grants you 15% Move Speed and a (150 + 40% bonus Attack Damage) Shield (100 + 30% bonus Attack Damage for ranged champions) for 2 seconds (8s cooldown, 16s cooldown for ranged champions).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 4% Armor Penetration

prowler's claw.name: Prowler's Claw
prowler's claw.description:
UNIQUE - Active - Sandswipe: Dash through target enemy, dealing (100 + 30% bonus Attack Damage) physical damage. For the next 3 seconds, you deal 15% increased damage to the target. (60s cooldown).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Lethality

serylda's grudge.name: Serylda's Grudge
serylda's grudge.stats:
+45 Attack Damage
+30 Percent Armor Penetration
+20 Ability Haste
serylda's grudge.description: UNIQUE - Bitter Cold: Damaging Abilities Slow enemies by 30% for 1 second.

serpent's fang.name: Serpent's Fang
serpent's fang.description:
UNIQUE - Shield Reaver: Attacks and spells deal (50 + 40% bonus Attack Damage) additional physical damage to Shielded targets.
Additional damage not applied to targets with shields that only block magic damage.
